subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: In his first statement since their prospective fight fell apart, Floyd Mayweather Jr. blamed Manny Pacquiao for the lack of a deal, saying Pacquiao refused to accept a reasonable compromise on drug-testing concerns.
snippet: In his first statement since their prospective fight fell apart, Floyd Mayweather Jr. blamed Manny Pacquiao for the lack of a deal, saying Pacquiao refused to accept a reasonable compromise on drug-testing concerns.
